record.description: Sponsored by the University of Chicago Student Social Committee, the annual Washington Prom [will be held] Friday evening, February 19 at the Congress Hotel. Tickets Committee members pictured seated, left to right: Adele Bretzfeld, Frances Fairweather, and Eleanor Melander; standing: Peggy Tillinghast, Ruth Glynn, and Margie Smith.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
